name: Evil Dead: Hail to the King
name_original: Evil Dead: Hail to the King
description:
Evil Dead: Hail to the King is an action-adventure game developed by Heavy Iron Studios. It came out on 04-12-2000. THQ published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Evil Dead: Hail to the King on Dreamcast, PlayStation and PC.
Mark Morris produced the game. Chris Rickwood, Jack Wall, Todd Dennis and Tommy Tallarico scored the game.
